word: I hope that George and you will strengthen one another in doing right, . . . in loving prayer, loving to do your duty, loving faithfulness, honesty, and uprightness. I have great confidence in George. He is a boy of good principle. Love one another, help one another, pray with each other, and for each other. Exert a good influence over the younger members of the family. May the Lord bless you.--Letter 16, 1867, pp. 1-4. (To "Dear Son Willie" [W. C. White], Dec. 10, 1867.)
